name: Violentmonkey
tagline: Violentmonkey, provides userscript support for Chromium-based Opera and Chrome.
body:
### Introduction
Violentmonkey is a userscript manager to support running userscripts in web pages. (Similar to Greasemonkey and Tampermonkey)

### Installation
* Opera: [:point_right: Go](https://addons.opera.com/extensions/details/violent-monkey/)
* Chrome: [:point_right: Go](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/violent-monkey/jinjaccalgkegednnccohejagnlnfdag)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
